introNodes.body:
*Albuquerque, New Mexico*

The desert sun beats down on suburban homes, where ordinary people live ordinary lives. But beneath the surface, darkness grows...

*One Year Ago*

You stand in a sterile doctor's office, the diagnosis still echoing in your ears: terminal lung cancer. Two years to live, at most.

You are Walter White. Chemistry teacher. Husband. Father of two.

For fifty years, you've played by the rules. Worked hard. Stayed quiet. And for what? To die broke and forgotten?

The ride-along with your DEA brother-in-law Hank changed everything. Watching him bust a meth lab, you saw opportunity where others saw crime.

With your chemistry knowledge, you could make the purest product on the market.

*Present Day*

You've made your decision. The question now is how to proceed.

Every choice has consequences. Money gained might mean relationships lost. Trust earned could mean suspicion raised.

Remember:
• [PROFIT] represents your financial gains
• [RELATIONSHIPS] shows how others view you
• [SUSPICION] tracks DEA heat - reach 100 and it's over

Your relationships affect everything. High trust means lower suspicion. Choose wisely.
